Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
Manages the game evolution Reads messages from the clients Sends messages to the Virtual Views

    • generatePlayer

      public void generatePlayer(String nickname, GregorianCalendar playerDate, int index)
      Sets up the information of the player added to the match
      Parameters:
      nickname - nick of the player added to the match
      playerDate - date of the player added to the match
      index - index for setting the PlayerNumber

    • newPlayer

      public boolean newPlayer(String nickname, String gameId, GregorianCalendar playerDate, VirtualView virtualView)
      Adds a player to the list of players of the match and initialize his dashboard and the match
      Parameters:
      nickname - of the player added to the match
      gameId - id of the match where we want to add the player
      playerDate - of the player added to the match
      virtualView - virtual view of the player added
      Returns:
      if the player joined successfully the game

      public void endGame(String disconnectedNickname)
      Shows the results of the match and disconnects the players from the game
      Parameters:
